channel.title: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
channel.description:
Well, I got this roughly 2 days ago now for my birthday. Was just wondering if any of you have it, and if so what is your high score/opinions. I just finished it on medium and am attempting it on hard but, it's a little challenging.
I really like it, nuff' said.

item.title: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

the fu superior:

Are you guys more comferable with the controller or guitar? I find that, when I play through the fire and flames, I can’t finish the song because my arm gets tired. So I would prefer the controller.

lolweakling lel
Nah, definitely the guitar imo.

Read full topic

error919:

Frets on Fire

Download Frets on Fire for free. Frets on Fire is a game of musical skill and fast fingers. The aim of the game is to play guitar with the keyboard as accurately as possible.

item.description:

[quote=“Mopman, post:7, topic:192472”]That’s like saying boxing games suck because “real men box irl”.

Or FPS’s suck because “real men just shoot each other IRL”.

Games != IRL.[/quote]

I do all that stuff IRL but guitar hero sucks ass out of fps games and boxing games.

item.source: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock

item.title: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

I have GH3, I just need to beat raining blood on expert. I only had a couple tries at it and now its at a friends house.

GH2 is much better than 3, it actually has some challenging songs on it. TTFAF is an easy song, the whole thing is pretty much hammer ons, the only thing hard about it is that it’s so fricking long that your fingers cramp and don’t do what you want them to do. Though the intro on expert is ridiculously hard, the rest is easy.

[quote=“Mopman, post:7, topic:192472”]That’s like saying boxing games suck because “real men box irl”.

Or FPS’s suck because “real men just shoot each other IRL”.

Games != IRL.[/quote]

Exactly. There is no use in saying ‘play a real guitar’ because

  1. It makes you look like a moron
  2. Nobody is going to listen to your lack of logic anyway.

Read full topic
